channel.title: Handiwork Games: A||State 2nd Edition Interview
channel.description:
I had the pleasure of interviewing Gregor, Malcolm and Morgan all about the new edition of A|State that they're working on. It'll be powered by the Forged In The Dark system.
If you want to learn about the design decisions they made with the new edition check it out.
[https://youtu.be/C4k5Yu7sACQ](https://youtu.be/C4k5Yu7sACQ)
The video was record as part of the online charity RPG convention AlbaCon - https://www.albacon.co.uk/ - which is on the 3rd & 4th of October 2020.
